doc.title: A.P.B.
doc.plot: Join Officer Bob on a very politically-incorrect, never-ending quest to meet his daily quota by arresting hitchhikers, litterbugs, honkers, dopers, speeders, muggers, murderers and the A.P.B.'s themselves such as Juan Fingers and Arson Carson. Bring in A.P.B.'s for questioning but do not get caught or else they will be released because of police brutality.
